text.0: Today at the Covid-19 Committee I asked Professor Jason Leitch to explain the “six week rule” following an investigation by @MrMcEnaney @FerretScot into @NHSGGC diverging from @scotgov guidance on self-isolating. @scotgov stands by national guidance. Link to article :backhand_index_pointing_down: https://t.co/QoPmRcYOdS https://t.co/ImMMywWnGc
text.1:
A false claim that Scotland's drug death statistics are not comparable to the UK or Europe has returned. We have updated our #factcheck.

https://t.co/tGl9gHuNqC
text.2: NHS board gave different Covid-19 isolation advice to councils https://t.co/ixHOP99j7B
text.3: Still got some Christmas gifts to get for your most discerning friends and family? Want to stay out of the shops? Avoid that lengthy post office queue? Nothing says festive like The Ferret (well, maybe). Get your gift subscription here: https://t.co/D11rAmoetJ
text.4: Health officials for Glasgow and Clyde issued different Covid-19 isolation instructions to those in place across the rest of Scotland, The Ferret can reveal.https://t.co/hybcgwFvXI
